name: wiggling
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
wiggle
to (cause to) move up and down and/or from side to side with small, quick movements: He tried wiggling the control stick but nothing happened. She wiggled her toes in the water. Her hips wiggle as she walks. Synonyms
jiggle
joggle
waggle
wriggle
